entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Rigolet
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this afternoon with 40 percent chance of flurries late this afternoon. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 29 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Thursday 02 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
